sentences.en: Biotite is a subordinate constituent of the mafic and ultramafic rocks generally.
sentences.cn: 黑云母一般是镁铁质及超镁铁质岩石中的次要成分.

sentences.en: Caffeine is the active constituent of drinks such as tea and coffee.
sentences.cn: 咖啡因是茶、咖啡之类饮品中的活性成分。

sentences.en: Cellulose is the major constituent of plant cell walls.
sentences.cn: 纤维素是植物细胞壁的主要成分.

sentences.en: Compounds can often split up by chemical reactions into their constituent elements.
sentences.cn: 化合物常能通过化学反应分解为构成该化合物的各个元素.

sentences.en: Flour, liquid, salt, and yeast are constituent parts of bread.
sentences.cn: 面粉, 水, 盐和酵粉是面包的组成成分.

sentences.en: Glycerol is a constituent of all fats and phospholipids.
sentences.cn: 甘油是所有脂肪和磷脂的组成部分.

sentences.en: He told his constituents that he would continue to represent them to the best of his ability.
sentences.cn: 他告诉他的选民们他会继续竭尽所能代表他们。

sentences.en: In higher plants the triacylglycerols are the major constituent of this class.
sentences.cn: 在高等植物中,三脂酰甘油是这类物质中的主要成分.

sentences.en: Its gain is the product of the gains of its constituent branches.
sentences.cn: 它的增益等于它含有的分支的增益的积.

sentences.en: Peat moss is a major constituent of most soil mixes.
sentences.cn: 泥苔藓是许多土壤混合物的主要成份.

sentences.en: Sulphur is a constituent of gunpowder.
The constituent squares in a squared rectangle have commensurable sides.
sentences.cn: 在方化矩形中,组成矩形的各个正方形有可公度的边.

sentences.en: The constitution also confers large powers on Brazil's 25 constituent states.
sentences.cn: 宪法还赋予巴西的25个成员州很大的权力。

sentences.en: the EU and its constituent members
The tricalcium phosphate constituent is converted to phosphoric acid and calcium sulfate.
sentences.cn: 磷酸三钙组分转化成为磷酸和硫酸钙.

sentences.en: This is equivalent to an angular distribution of constituent plane waves.
sentences.cn: 这等价于各种成分的平面波的角分布.

sentences.en: Water vapor is a normal constituent of the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 水蒸气是大气的正常组成部分.

words.tran_cn: 基本的；本质的；制定的；构成分子的
（选区的）选民；支持者；（一批）顾客

phrases.tran_cn: 立宪会议；国民代表大会

trans.tran_en: being one of the parts of something
someone who votes in a particular area
